oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The View: A Short Tour of CBU
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Buildings; Universities & colleges
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Brother Terence McLaughlin, with his lengthy presence at Christian Brothers University, has crafted much of the school's written history. In THE VIEW, he provided brief descriptions of buildings and and memorials around campus as of 2009.
Brother Terence was President of CBC from 1962-1964.
